forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: A chance of rain showers before midnight, then a chance of rain showers and patchy fog between midnight and 5am, then patchy fog and a slight chance of rain showers. Cloudy, with a low around 59. East southeast wind around 7 mph. Chance of precipitation is 40%. New rainfall amounts less than a tenth of an inch possible.

forecast.shortForecast: Patchy Fog then Chance Showers And Thunderstorms
forecast.detailedForecast: Patchy fog and a slight chance of rain showers before 8am, then a chance of rain showers and patchy fog between 8am and 2pm, then a chance of showers and thunderstorms. Mostly cloudy, with a high near 74. Southeast wind around 8 mph. Chance of precipitation is 40%. New rainfall amounts less than a tenth of an inch possible.

nubsNob.comments: Thank you for making 2024-25 another great season! Stay tuned for updates, we look forward to having you back next year.
